multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask only one question at a time, and it should not be more than 1 line. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. Do not ask the same question multiple times. Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I am here for multiple spots on my face that have been there since I was a teenager but have been increasing in number.
How old are you currently?
I am 65 years old.
Have these spots changed in color or size recently?
No, they have not changed in color or size recently; they have just increased in number.
Do these spots have a rough texture?
No, the spots are smooth, like dome-shaped papules on my face.
Do they tend to bleed or itch?
No, they do not bleed or itch.
Do you have a family history of similar skin conditions?
I don't have a family history of similar skin conditions, but there is a history of multiple renal cysts and recurrent pneumothorax in my family.
Final Diagnosis: Birt-Hogg-Dubé syndrome
